document_data.name: ''Heart's Splinter''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Heart's Splinter''''' was an enchanted [[rapier]] found in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''Heart's Splinter'' had an intricately decorated hilt and guard that had an [[gem]] stone at the design's center.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Heart's Splinter model.jpg|thumb|''The Heart's Splinter in Calliope's hands.'']]
The ''Heart's Splinter's'' magic allowed the owner to attack their opponents at a distance as well as in melee range. Additionally, upon a successful hit, the target could be affected by magical paralyzing ''[[fear]]'', incapacitating them for a short period of time.
